body:
Dr.Stone from doujinka Bocchi made a way better job than this losers weebs timestop bullshit.
No matter the color.
No matter if translated.
Heck not even animated.
God forbid a hentai oav of this crap.
Nuttin will ever improve this shit.
Trouble is that sore Trumplosers probably dig this kind of debauchery not only dickless Japs.
So what?
So we can expect more horsehit like that straight from the arseholes right into wimps asses.
Loathsome.
Hateful.
Spitfull.
Detestable.
